comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I mean, I am kind of sure there must be some studies which indeed shows that the state of our surroundings can have both positive and negative effects onto our mental and physical well-being.However, it would be easier to talk about this matter if you explained it from a political/societal, otherwise, it feels rather off-topic.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: How will you expect someone who is not neat to himself to live in a neat and tidy environment, we have to understand that this all begins with our personal hygiene, some people were so dirty that they cannot take their bath a day or brush their teeth not to talk of changing their dirty clothes they always put on, how will their environment be, i dirty environment will definitely abhor dangerous animals like snakes and scorpion, we have to inculcate a good environmental sanitation for the well-being of the living lives that dwell in the environment we lived in.

Some persons smoke cigarettes indiscriminately without considering the environmental consequences or the harm it cause to the next person. I was in a meeting and the chairman of the council smoked up to three sticks of cigarettes and I was almost suffocating but I couldn't complain because others kept silent. The next meeting he wanted to do the same thing and I told him to step outside and smoke his cigarettes which he gladly did.My country is a dumping ground for outdated cars and electronic devices that pollutes the environment. Most fumes produced by these old model and unserviced vehicles is having negative effect on the environment. Instable power supply has also led to an increase in the use of generators, thereby harming the environment.These environmental pollutants have contributed to increase in health issues like cancer, respiratory problems, heart infection and child mortality rate. I wish to relocate to a more environmentally friendly country.

comments.body: Quote from: Flydolphine on March 02, 2023, 10:01:54 AMThe first step to help our environment is "taking action".let's together fight global warming.Lot of human activities constitute to tue effect of global warming, we need to caution how we engage the use of polluting agent in rendering the environment unfit for living, especially through the release of toxic chemicals like carbon monoxide and other harzards from human activities such as incomplete fuel combustion, refinery waste, degraded chemical waste and so on, they all affect the ozone layer and environmental safety because they can cause loss of life on a short or long term effect when introduced.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Yes, everything around us in our environment is polluted, water, air, soil, food and everything, but what should be done?This is what they call the tax of civilization, progress and technology, because of the quality of life and modern luxury in which we live, we are forced to bear these pollutants that fill our environment.Even the countryside which was previously innocent of pollution and had clean air and water is now polluted because of the manure, hormones and other things that they use to get abundant agricultural products in a short time.In short, our whole life is polluted and it is difficult to get out of this circle.
